patthana24.13:4.1: Nasārammaṇaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sārammaṇo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.13:4.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … purejāte āsevane ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana24.13:5.1: Naanārammaṇaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sārammaṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.13:5.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
